marcela

                java.lang.String applyTo)
         throws MaryConfigurationException
Model constructor

Parameters:
featureManager - the feature processor manager used to compute the symbolic features used for prediction
dataFileName - in HMM models this data file corresponds to the configuration file of the HMM voice
targetAttributeName - attribute in MARYXML to predict
targetAttributeFormat - print style, not used in HMM models
featureName - not used in HMMModel
predictFrom - not used in HMMModel
applyTo - not used in HMMModel
Throws:
MaryConfigurationException - if there are missing files or problems loading trees and pdf files.
Method Detail

setPredictDurAndF0

public void setPredictDurAndF0(boolean bval)
This variable is set to true whenever the same HMMModel is used to predict both duration and F0. by default the variable is false, so that means that two different HMMModels are used for predicting duration and F0, in this case there is no state durations information to predict F0.

Parameters:
bval -

loadDataFile

protected void loadDataFile()
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            MaryConfigurationException
Load trees and pdfs, from HMM configuration file.

Specified by:
loadDataFile in class Model
Throws:
MaryConfigurationException - if there are missing files or problems loading trees and pdf files.
java.io.IOException - if any files cannot be properly read

applyTo

public void applyTo(java.util.List<org.w3c.dom.Element> elements)
             throws MaryConfigurationException
Predict duration for the list of elements. If the same HMMModel is used to predict duration and F0 then a utterance model is created and kept in a WeakHashMap, so the next call to this module, for predicting F0, can use that utterance model.

Overrides:
applyTo in class Model
Parameters:
elements - elements from MaryXML for which to predict the values
Throws:
MaryConfigurationException - if error searching in HMM trees.

applyFromTo

public void applyFromTo(java.util.List<org.w3c.dom.Element> predictFromElements,
                        java.util.List<org.w3c.dom.Element> applyToElements)
                 throws MaryConfigurationException
Predict F0 for the list of elements and apply to another list of elements. If the same HMMModel is used to predict duration and F0 then there must be a utterance model created in a previous call to this module, that will be used to predict F0. If there is no previously created utterance model then one is created.

Overrides:
applyFromTo in class Model
Parameters:
predictFromElements - elements from MaryXML for which to predict the values
applyToElements - elements from MaryXML for which to apply the predicted values
Throws:
MaryConfigurationException - if error searching in HMM trees.

evaluate

protected float evaluate(Target target)
Apply the HMM to a Target to get its predicted value, this method is not used in HMMModel.

Specified by:
evaluate in class Model
Returns:
target value
Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException - if this method is called.
